translations.description: Creating incredible digital experiences with modern technologies
translations.projectsDescription: A collection of projects that showcase my skills and experience
translations.aboutDescription: Fullstack developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions
translations.myStoryText1: With over 5 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating modern and scalable applications. My passion for technology drives me to always be learning and adapting to the latest development trends.
translations.myStoryText2: I focus on writing clean, maintainable and efficient code, always looking for best practices and design patterns. I enjoy working on both frontend and backend, which allows me to have a complete vision of application development.
translations.frontendDescription: Development of modern and responsive user interfaces
translations.freelanceDescription: Complete web application development for diverse clients
translations.description_head: Portfolio of a fullstack developer - Creating incredible digital experiences
